foreignData.name: Ausheben
foreignData.text:
Wähle eine Kreaturenkarte Deiner Wahl mit Gesamtspruchkosten von 3 oder weniger aus Deinem Friedhof und bringe diese Kreatur ins Spiel.
Umwandlung 2

name: Unearth
originalText:
Choose target creature card in your graveyard with total casting cost 3 or less and put that creature into play.
Cycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

rulings.text: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.
If a card in a player’s graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

text:
Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
